message:
The State of Israel settles the score with one of the greatest Palestinian murderers: Mohammed Deif is eliminated!

After about 30 years of pursuit and 7 failed assassination attempts, on July 13th in Khan Yunis Israel finally managed to eliminate the commander of the military wing of Hamas, the head of the military pyramid, the symbol, the pulsating spirit of the Izz ad-Din al-Qassam Brigades: Mohammed Deif.

Mohammed Deif, Abu Khaled, was born in 1965 in Khan Yunis in the southern Gaza Strip (where he also died) under the name Mohammed Diab Ibrahim al-Masri.
He received his nickname الضيف Deif, which means "the guest" in Arabic, following his activity as a "guest" in the West Bank territories  "Dafa" الضفة, where he contributed to the establishment of the Izz ad-Din al-Qassam Brigades, since he is considered a guest in the West Bank (he is originally from the Gaza Strip) who did not settle in one place.

In 1989, Daf was detained by Israel for 16 months, in administrative detention, due to his membership in the Hamas military apparatus founded by Salah Shehade. Later, this mechanism became the military arm of Hamas Izz ad-Din al-Qassam Brigades.
In 1993, after the assassination of the commander of the military wing of Hamas at the time, Imad Akel, Mohammed Deif began to establish his status as a "super terrorist". Alongside the engineer Yahya Ayyash, who was in charge of Hamas' terrorist activities in the West Bank, Deif became the head of Hamas's military arm in the Gaza Strip. The two cooperated and were behind prominent terrorist attacks such as the kidnapping of the soldier Nachshon Wachsman. In 1996, Yahya Ayyash was killed, and Mohammad Def made sure to carry out a series of revenge attacks for his killing, including a deadly attack on Route 18 in Jerusalem.

In 2000 he was arrested by the Palestinian Authority but managed to escape from prison during the second intifada.

After the assassination of the terrorist chief Salah Shehade in July 2002, Deif was appointed the supreme commander of the military wing of Hamas, until his assassination on July 13, 2024.

Deif was not revealed to the public and for many years they did not know in Israel what he looked like and in what state of health he was.
On rare occasions he used to send audio recordings to raise the morale of his operatives, he did on October 7th when the massacres broke out.

This is an important achievement of the IDF and Israel - first and foremost at the cognitive level - he has become a symbol, a myth and a legend in the eyes of the Palestinians and their supporters. He has been implicated for decades in the Israeli intelligence mechanisms time and time again. His elimination is an important closing of the circle.

On the practical level, his military influence at the current stage of the war was little, but Israel can and must leverage the awareness of his death and convince the senior Hamas officials who are still alive, that their time is drawing near... for if Israel succeeded in eliminating the cat with nine lives, then their chances of avoiding a similar fate are not high and it would be wise to surrender.
Let them ask Haniyeh...

🇮🇱🇮🇱🇮🇱
event_breakdown: Deif was eliminated on July 13, 2022 in Khan Yunis, in the southern Gaza Strip.

message:
Joint Statement by the IDF and ISA: Muhammad Deif, Hamas Chief of Staff - eliminated!

The IDF announces that on July 13th, 2024, IDF fighter jets struck in the area of Khan Yunis, and following an intelligence assessment, it can be confirmed that Mohammed Deif was eliminated in the strike.
event_breakdown: * Joint Statement by the IDF and ISA: Muhammad Deif, Hamas Chief of Staff - eliminated! (location: Khan Yunis, Gaza Strip)

message:
The head of the political bureau of Hamas was eliminated and the military arm of Hamas was not able to launch a single explosive at southern Israel.

Who would have believed a year ago that such a thing could happen.
event_breakdown: The head of the political bureau of Hamas, Ismail Haniyeh, was eliminated. The military arm of Hamas was not able to launch a single explosive at southern Israel. This is a major setback for Hamas, which is responsible for numerous terrorist attacks in the region. The Israeli military had been targeting Hamas positions and infrastructure in response to the group's rocket attacks, and it appears that their efforts have been successful.

message:

2. Attacked a civilian area

We denied our responsibility for the incident at Majdal Shams. We are not afraid to accept responsibility if we are wrong.
According to an internal investigation we conducted, what happened in Majdal Shams is not our fault.

The campaign entered a new phase, after the attack in Hodeidah and after the elimination of Haniyeh.

Nasrallah's Speech in Beirut
Hezbollah leader Nasrallah to give a speech in Beirut tonight at 8pm. The content of the speech has not been released, but many are expecting a response to the Israeli attack in Dahieh of Beirut.

message: The German airline Lufthansa extends the suspension of its flights to and from Beirut until August 12.
event_breakdown:
Lufthansa extends suspension of flights to Beirut
The German airline Lufthansa has extended the suspension of its flights to and from Beirut until August 12. The airline cited a deteriorating security situation in Lebanon as the reason for the decision. Lufthansa had previously suspended its flights from and to Beirut on July 19. The decision will affect passengers on flights LH 561 and LH 562. Lufthansa said it was monitoring the situation and would make a decision on resuming flights at a later date.

The security situation in Lebanon has been deteriorating in recent weeks, with anti-government protests and a political crisis that has paralyzed the country. Lufthansa's decision to suspend flights until August 12 is a reflection of the growing concern over security in Lebanon.

message:
The Iranian Chief of Staff:

The reaction to the elimination of Hania is a fait accompli.

The Zionist entity will regret what it did.

We are considering our reaction and that of the axis of resistance to the elimination of Haniyeh.
event_breakdown: Chief of the Iranian armed forces Major General Mohammad Bagheri had harsh words for Israel, vowing that the Israeli military would regret the killing of Palestinian Islamic Jihad leader Abu Al-Abbas. He also said they would wait to decide the specific reaction to the assassination, while consulting with the "axis of resistance" - a term used for Iran's network of proxy militia groups across the Middle East

message:
A phenomenal month and a half against the "axis of resistance":

1. The head of the political wing of Hamas was killed - Ismail Haniyeh.

2. The head of the military wing of Hamas was eliminated - Mohammed Deif.

3. The Hezbollah Chief of Staff was eliminated (according to the definition of the Minister of Defense) - Fuad Shukr.

4. The commander of the Aziz unit in Hezbollah was killed (equivalent to a member of the General Staff) - Mohammed Nasser, Hajj Abu Neema.

5. The commander of the Nasser unit in Hezbollah (equivalent to a member of the General Staff) Taleb Abdullah was killed.

6. The commander of the Khan Yunis brigade in Hamas (equivalent to a member of the General Staff) and Mohammed Deif's right-hand man - Rafa'a Salameh, was killed.
event_breakdown:
Event 1: Mohammad Deif, the military wing of Hamas was killed.
Event 2: Fuad Shukr, the Hezbollah Chief of Staff, was eliminated.
Event 3: Hajj Abu Neema, the commander of the Aziz unit in Hezbollah, was killed.
Event 4: Taleb Abdullah, the commander of the Nasser unit in Hezbollah, was killed.
Event 5: Rafa'a Salameh, the right hand man of Mohammad Deif, the commander of the Khan Yunis brigade in Hamas, was killed.

message:
Supporters of the Shiite axis on social media curse the Jordanians for deciding to defend their airspace - which is actually a buffer between Iran and Israel - this against the backdrop of Iranian statements of intent to take revenge on Israel.

It is amusing that they protest Jordanian sovereignty when the argument for the Iranian response is Iranian sovereignty.

message:
The Jordanian Foreign Minister, on the background of the expected Iranian reaction to the assassination of Haniyeh:

We will not allow anyone to turn Jordan into a war zone.
event_breakdown:
Jordan's King Abdullah II warns of Iranian retaliation in wake of drone strike on Baghdad

Jordan's King Abdullah II has warned that Iran may retaliate against his country over last Wednesday's airstrike in Baghdad that killed a senior Iraqi militia commander, Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis,Reuters reported.

"We are worried that what has happened might create a vacuum (intellectual or security) that different parties may exploit," the Jordanian king was quoted as saying by Reuters.

Abdullah also added that his country is willing to mediate between the US and Iran.

The Israeli air defense system called Arrow system, which is part of the country's defense capabilities, is being tested in the Israeli desert.

"It's not a military escalation - it's an exercise," a senior IDF source told The Jerusalem Post's sister paper Maariv in a Hebrew article.

A senior IDF source told the paper it has "zero intention" of attacking the Lebanese army or any of its soldiers, and that the exercise is being conducted in light of the recent incidents on the Lebanese front.

"The IDF does not operate in Lebanon," the source said.

message:
IDF Spokesperson: Based on IDF and ISA intelligence, the IAF struck terrorists operating inside a compound within the Dalal School in the area of Shejaiya in Gaza City. The compound was used by Hamas as a hideout for commanders and operatives and to plan terror attacks against the State of Israel.

Prior to the strike, numerous steps were taken to mitigate the risk of harming civilians, including the use of precise munitions, surveillance, and additional intelligence. 

The Hamas terrorist organization systematically violates international law by operating inside civilian infrastructure and exploiting the civilian population as human shields for its terrorist activities.
event_breakdown:
IDF Spokesperson:

Based on IDF and ISA intelligence, the IAF struck terrorists operating inside a compound within the Dalal School in the area of Shejaiya in Gaza City. The compound was used by Hamas as a hideout for commanders and operatives and to plan terror attacks against the State of Israel.

The IDF Spokesperson reported that "numerous steps were taken to mitigate the risk of harming civilians, including the use of precise munitions, surveillance, and additional intelligence".

message: The body of Ismail Haniyeh in Doha, Qatar
event_breakdown:
1. The body of Ismail Haniyeh, the head of the Hamas Political Bureau, was found in Doha, Qatar on Sunday, police said.
2. A police statement said that Haniyeh's body had been discovered in his car and that the cause of death had not yet been determined.
3. The Hamas leader had been staying in Qatar since 2012, where he had been working to negotiate the release of Palestinian prisoners held by Israel.
4. Haniyeh's death was not related to any violence or criminal activity, police said.

message:
Senior Hamas official Izzat al-Risheq reacts to the IDF spokesman's report on the assassination of Mohammad Deif:

Confirming or denying the death of senior members of the Hamas military wing is a matter for the military wing and the Hamas leadership.
As long as none of them announced anything, none of the news that appears in the media can be confirmed.

##
Senior Hamas leader Mahmoud Mardawi, for his part, states, according to the Al-Arabiya network, that Mohammad Deif is safe and sound and that he is following the Israeli claims about his elimination.

There is no coordination between senior Hamas officials... the head is gone...
